title: Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Pasta with Garlic, Scallions, Cauliflower & Breadcrumbs a try.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Toss breadcrumbs with 1/4 cup olive oil, salt and pepper. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Meanwhile, cut cauliflower into small florets. Toss with 1/4 cup olive oil, salt, pepper and red pepper flakes. Spread on a baking sheet and bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown.
In a large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Add pasta, cauliflower and breadcrumbs. Toss to combine and serve.
